# Shadcn UI Instructions

This file provides an overview of available Shadcn UI documentation. For detailed instructions, refer to the files in `/docs/shadcn/`.

## Components
- **Field Component**: Combine labels, controls, and help text to compose accessible form fields and grouped inputs.
  - See: `/docs/shadcn/shadcn-ui.new-field.documentation.md`
- **Empty Component**: Use the Empty component to display an empty state.
  - See: `/docs/shadcn/shadcn.empty.component.md`
- **Data Table Component**: Implement data tables with sorting, filtering, and pagination.
  - See: `/docs/shadcn/shadcn-ui.data-table.md`

All shadcn components are installed and set up in this codebase at `src/components/ui`.
